Package de.mycrocast.android.sdk.live.data

Class LiveStream

java.lang.Object
de.mycrocast.android.sdk.live.data.LiveStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
de.mycrocast.android.sdk.core.Identifiable
public final class LiveStream extends Object implements de.mycrocast.android.sdk.core.Identifiable
This class represents a single live stream (a live broadcast started by a user from within the mycrocast app)

  • Method Details

    • getStartTime

      public long getStartTime()
      Get the start time of the stream in milliseconds as unix timestamp
      Returns:
      the start time of the stream

    • getListenerCount

      public int getListenerCount()
      Gets the current amount of listener to this stream
      Returns:
      - the listener

    • getPeakListenerCount

      public int getPeakListenerCount()
      Get the current highest amount of listener that existed during this live stream
      Returns:
      the peak listener count

    • isMuted

      public boolean isMuted()
      Determine if a stream is currently muted. The streamer can control this state. When the stream is muted, the mute music should be played
      Returns:
      true if the streamer is muted otherwise false

    • getMuteMusicUrl

      public String getMuteMusicUrl()

      Get the url of the mute music, that should be played if the user listens to this livestream and this livestream is currently muted.

      If the url is not configured in the mycrocast-platform for club's, this will return the url of the default mute music of mycrocast.

      Returns:
      the url to play while this livestream is muted

    • getLikeCount

      public int getLikeCount()
      Get the current amount of likes from the users for this stream
      Returns:
      the amount of likes

    • getDislikeCount

      public int getDislikeCount()
      Get the current amount of dislikes provided by the users for this stream
      Returns:
      the current dislikes

    • getTitle

      public String getTitle()
      Get the title of stream as provided by the streamer during the creation of the stream or later updated by the streamer from within the mycrocast app
      Returns:
      the current title

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      The streamer can during creation of the stream provide a description. This field is optional
      Returns:
      - return the description, if any from the streamer

    • getScoring

      public Scoring getScoring()
      If the streamer decides to start the stream as a scoring stream (2 teams with scoring) The team related information are present here. Check with hasScoring() to see if this is present
      Returns:
      the scoring (or null)

    • getGenre

      public String getGenre()

    • getLanguage

      public StreamLanguage getLanguage()

    • getStreamerName

      public String getStreamerName()
      Returns:
      the name of the streamer

    • getClubName

      public String getClubName()
      Returns:
      The name of the club

    • getClubLogoUrl

      public String getClubLogoUrl()
      Returns:
      get the url of the club logo, if any was configured from the club. This can return null

    • getClubHeaderUrl

      public String getClubHeaderUrl()
      Returns:
      get the url where the header image can be found if any is configured from the club. This can return null

    • hasScoring

      public boolean hasScoring()
      Returns:
      Determine if this is a general stream or a scoring stream

      Specified by:
